Invites users specified in the request to the current portal.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["invitations"],"type":"object","properties":{"invitations":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["All","RoomAdmin","Guest","DocSpaceAdmin","User"],"type":"string","description":"[All - All, RoomAdmin - Room admin, Guest - Guest, DocSpaceAdmin - DocSpace admin, User - User]","example":"All"},{"enum":[0,1,2,3,4],"type":"integer","description":"[0 - All, 1 - Room admin, 2 - Guest, 3 - DocSpace admin, 4 - User]","example":0,"x-enum-varnames":["All","RoomAdmin","Guest","DocSpaceAdmin","User"],"x-enum-descriptions":["All","Room admin","Guest","DocSpace admin","User"]}],"description":"The user type.","title":"EmployeeType"},"email":{"type":"string","description":"The user email address.","format":"email","nullable":true,"example":"Sydney_Roberts4@hotmail.com"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The user invitation parameters.","title":"UserInvitationRequestDto"},"description":"The list of user invitations."},"culture":{"type":"string","description":"The culture code of invitations.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for inviting users.","title":"InviteUsersRequestDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
